name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Kevin Scott STAIR, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Kevin Scott STAIR, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 28th day of August, 1996, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED, but limited to the following issues:
1. What is the legal significance of the fact that the trooper acted outside the territory of the Commonwealth?
2. What, if any, remedy is appropriate for such actions?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
681 A.2d 174
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Kevin Scott STAIR, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 28, 1996.
